verses.verse: Yet now<WH6258> hear,<WH8085> O Jacob<WH3290> my servant;<WH5650> and Israel,<WH3478> whom I have chosen:<WH977>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> that made<WH6213> you, and formed<WH3335> you from the womb,<WH990> which will help<WH5826> you; Fear<WH3372> not, O Jacob,<WH3290> my servant;<WH5650> and you, Jesurun,<WH3484> whom I have chosen.<WH977>

For I will pour<WH3332> water<WH4325> on him that is thirsty,<WH6771> and floods<WH5140> on the dry<WH3004> ground: I will pour<WH3332> my spirit<WH7307> on your seed,<WH2233> and my blessing<WH1293> on your offspring:<WH6631>
And they shall spring<WH6779> up as among<WH996> the grass,<WH2682> as willows<WH6155> by the water<WH4325> courses.<WH2988>

One shall say,<WH559> I am the LORD's;<WH3068> and another<WH2088> shall call<WH7121> himself by the name<WH8034> of Jacob;<WH3290> and another<WH2088> shall subscribe<WH3789> with his hand<WH3027> to the LORD,<WH3068> and surname<WH3655> himself by the name<WH8034> of Israel.<WH3478>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> the King<WH4428> of Israel,<WH3478> and his redeemer<WH1350> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> I am the first,<WH7223> and I am the last;<WH314> and beside<WH1107> me there is no<WH369> God.<WH430>

And who,<WH4310> as I, shall call,<WH7121> and shall declare<WH5046> it, and set it in order<WH6186> for me, since I appointed<WH7760> the ancient<WH5769> people?<WH5971> and the things that are coming,<WH857> and shall come,<WH935> let them show<WH5046> to them.

Fear<WH6342> you not, neither<WH408> be afraid:<WH7297> have not I told<WH8085> you from that time,<WH227> and have declared<WH5046> it? you are even my witnesses.<WH5707> Is there a God<WH433> beside<WH1107> me? yes, there is no<WH369> God;<WH6697> I know<WH3045> not any.

They that make<WH3335> a graven<WH6459> image are all<WH3605> of them vanity;<WH8414> and their delectable<WH2530> things shall not profit;<WH3276> and they are their own witnesses;<WH5707> they see<WH7200> not, nor<WH1077> know;<WH3045> that they may be ashamed.<WH954>
Who<WH4310> has formed<WH3335> a god,<WH410> or molten<WH5258> a graven<WH6459> image that is profitable<WH3276> for nothing?<WH1115>

Behold,<WH2005> all<WH3605> his fellows<WH2270> shall be ashamed:<WH954> and the workmen,<WH2796> they are of men:<WH120> let them all<WH3605> be gathered<WH6908> together, let them stand<WH5975> up; yet they shall fear,<WH6342> and they shall be ashamed<WH954> together.<WH3162>

The smith<WH2796> <WH1270> with the tongs<WH4621> both works<WH6466> in the coals,<WH6352> and fashions<WH3335> it with hammers,<WH4717> and works<WH6466> it with the strength<WH3581> of his arms:<WH2220> yes,<WH1571> he is hungry,<WH7456> and his strength<WH3581> fails:<WH369> he drinks<WH8354> no<WH3808> water,<WH4325> and is faint.<WH3286>

The carpenter<WH2796> <WH6086> stretches<WH5186> out his rule;<WH6957> he marks<WH8388> it out with a line;<WH8279> he fits<WH6213> it with planes,<WH4741> and he marks<WH8388> it out with the compass,<WH4230> and makes<WH6213> it after the figure<WH8403> of a man,<WH376> according to the beauty<WH8597> of a man;<WH120> that it may remain<WH3427> in the house.<WH1004>

He hews<WH3772> him down cedars,<WH730> and takes<WH3947> the cypress<WH8645> and the oak,<WH437> which he strengthens<WH553> for himself among the trees<WH6086> of the forest:<WH3293> he plants<WH5195> an ash,<WH766> and the rain<WH1653> does nourish<WH1431> it.

Then shall it be for a man<WH120> to burn:<WH1197> for he will take<WH3947> thereof, and warm<WH2552> himself; yes,<WH637> he kindles<WH5400> it, and bakes<WH644> bread;<WH3899> yes,<WH637> he makes<WH6466> a god,<WH410> and worships<WH7812> it; he makes<WH6213> it a graven<WH6459> image, and falls<WH5456> down<WH5456> thereto.

He burns<WH8313> part<WH2677> thereof in the fire;<WH784> with part<WH2677> thereof he eats<WH398> flesh;<WH1320> he roasts<WH6740> roast,<WH6748> and is satisfied:<WH7646> yes,<WH637> he warms<WH2552> himself, and said,<WH559> Aha,<WH253> I am warm,<WH2552> I have seen<WH7200> the fire:<WH217>

And the residue<WH7611> thereof he makes<WH6213> a god,<WH410> even his graven<WH6459> image: he falls<WH5456> down<WH5456> to it, and worships<WH7812> it, and prays<WH6419> to it, and said,<WH559> Deliver<WH5337> me; for you are my god.<WH410>
They have not known<WH3045> nor<WH3808> understood:<WH995> for he has shut<WH2902> their eyes,<WH5869> that they cannot see;<WH7200> and their hearts,<WH3826> that they cannot understand.<WH7919>

And none<WH3808> considers<WH7725> in his heart,<WH3820> neither<WH3808> is there knowledge<WH1847> nor<WH3808> understanding<WH8394> to say,<WH559> I have burned<WH8314> part<WH2677> of it in the fire;<WH784> yes,<WH637> also<WH637> I have baked<WH644> bread<WH3899> on the coals<WH1513> thereof; I have roasted<WH6740> flesh,<WH1320> and eaten<WH398> it: and shall I make<WH6213> the residue<WH3499> thereof an abomination?<WH8441> shall I fall<WH5456> down<WH5456> to the stock<WH944> of a tree?<WH6086>

He feeds<WH7462> on ashes:<WH665> a deceived<WH2048> heart<WH3820> has turned<WH5186> him aside,<WH5186> that he cannot<WH3808> deliver<WH5337> his soul,<WH5315> nor<WH3808> say,<WH559> Is there not a lie<WH3576> in my right<WH3225> hand?<WH3225>

Remember<WH2142> these,<WH428> O Jacob<WH3290> and Israel;<WH3478> for you are my servant:<WH5650> I have formed<WH3335> you; you are my servant:<WH5650> O Israel,<WH3478> you shall not be forgotten<WH5382> of me.
I have blotted<WH4229> out, as a thick cloud,<WH5645> your transgressions,<WH6588> and, as a cloud,<WH6051> your sins:<WH2403> return<WH7725> to me; for I have redeemed<WH1350> you.

Sing,<WH7442> O you heavens;<WH8064> for the LORD<WH3068> has done<WH6213> it: shout,<WH7321> you lower<WH8482> parts of the earth:<WH776> break<WH6476> forth into singing,<WH7440> you mountains,<WH2022> O forest,<WH3293> and every<WH3605> tree<WH6086> therein: for the LORD<WH3068> has redeemed<WH1350> Jacob,<WH3290> and glorified<WH6286> himself in Israel.<WH3478>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> your redeemer,<WH1350> and he that formed<WH3335> you from the womb,<WH990> I am the LORD<WH3068> that makes<WH6213> all<WH3605> things; that stretches<WH5186> forth the heavens<WH8064> alone;<WH905> that spreads<WH7554> abroad<WH7554> the earth<WH776> by myself;

That frustrates<WH6565> the tokens<WH226> of the liars,<WH907> and makes diviners<WH7080> mad;<WH1984> that turns<WH7725> wise<WH2450> men backward,<WH268> and makes their knowledge<WH1847> foolish;<WH5528>

That confirms<WH6965> the word<WH1697> of his servant,<WH5650> and performes<WH7999> the counsel<WH6098> of his messengers;<WH4397> that said<WH559> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> You shall be inhabited;<WH3427> and to the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> You shall be built,<WH1129> and I will raise<WH6965> up the decayed<WH2723> places thereof:
That said<WH559> to the deep,<WH6683> Be dry,<WH2717> and I will dry<WH3001> up your rivers:<WH5103>

That said<WH559> of Cyrus,<WH3566> He is my shepherd,<WH7462> and shall perform<WH7999> all<WH3605> my pleasure:<WH2656> even saying<WH559> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> You shall be built;<WH1129> and to the temple,<WH1964> Your foundation<WH3245> shall be laid.
